name: Tiny Story 3 adventure
description:
You wake up a morning and discover that the sea disappeared ... what happened? Solve this mystery, complete quests.

With Tiny Story 3 - Wolfy and the missing sea, experience a fantastic adventure full of puzzles to solve. Many quests await you in this new opus of Tiny Story adventure.

This game remains in the tradition of its predecessors, a cute point-and-click adventure game, full of interesting puzzles, cute, fun, without advertising nor violence.

Relax by playing the character of Wolfy who discovers one morning that the sea has disappeared. It's up to you to solve this strange mystery.
